title: Asia Stocks Edge Higher as Traders Await Fed Clues: Markets Wrap
description: Asian stocks crept higher in early trade following a sluggish session on Wall Street as investors awaited clues on the Federal Reserve’s policy path in its final interest-rate decision of the year.
content: Asian stocks crept higher in early trade following a sluggish session on Wall Street as investors awaited clues on the Federal Reserve’s policy path in its final interest-rate decision of the year.
